stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, place 9 credits on it. When the Corp's turn begins, they may take 3 credits from this agenda. This ability is active even while this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
text:
When this agenda is scored or stolen, place 9[credit] on it.
When the Corp's turn begins, they may take 3[credit] from this agenda. This ability is active even while this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
title: SSL Endorsement
